Package com.example.seqr.controllers

Class ReusableQrController

java.lang.Object
com.example.seqr.controllers.ReusableQrController
public class ReusableQrController extends Object
A controller class for managing reusable QR pairs in Firestore.

  • Method Details

    • addQRpair

      public void addQRpair(String checkInQR, String promotionQR, String previousEventName, String eventID)
      Add a new QR pair to Firestore.
      Parameters:
      checkInQR - The QR code for check-in
      promotionQR - The QR code for promotion
      previousEventName - The name of the previous event
      eventID - The ID of the event associated with the QR pair

    • getQRpairs

      public void getQRpairs(com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot> onCompleteListener)
      Retrieve all QR pairs from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      onCompleteListener - Listener to handle the completion of the retrieval operation

    • deleteQRPair

      public void deleteQRPair(String eventID)
      Delete a QR pair from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event associated with the QR pair to delete
